briefTitle: An Open-label Extension Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of ISIS 301012 (Mipomersen) in Patients With Familial Hypercholesterolemia or Severe-Hypercholesterolemia

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Satisfactory completion of dosing in their initial study (Protocol 301012-CS5 \[NCT00607373\], 301012-CS7 \[NCT00706849\], 301012-CS17 \[NCT00477594\], or MIPO3500108 \[NCT00794664\])

Exclusion Criteria:

* Had any new condition or worsening of existing condition which in the opinion of the Investigator would make the participant unsuitable for enrollment, or could interfere with the participant participating in or completing the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C)
outcomeMeasures.description: Baseline was defined as the last value prior to receiving the first dose of mipomersen in this study (for participants randomized to placebo in their index study and for participants randomized to mipomersen in their index study and their first dose of mipomersen in this study was administered \>=6 months from their last dose of mipomersen in their index study), or the last value prior to receiving the first dose of mipomersen in their index study (for participants randomized to mipomersen in their index study and their first dose of mipomersen in this study was administered \<6 months from their last dose of mipomersen in their index study).
